actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide tax incentives to encourage physicians, dentists, and optometrists to practice in physician shortage areas.

summary.text: Allows an exclusion from adjusted gross income under the Internal Revenue Code of up to $57,500 over a five-year period to doctors, dentists, and optometrists who pratice continuously for at least 2 years (but only $35,000 is excludible for the first 2 years) in a physician-shortage area.

titles.title: A bill to provide tax incentives to encourage physicians, dentists, and optometrists to practice in physician shortage areas.
